description: Real life couple Jessie Colter and Trey Turner have been heating up many porn viewers over the past year. Jessie and Trey have invited us into their bedroom to watch as they explore each other bodies like only true lovers can.  From start to finish our cameras were rolling and you get to see up close and personal how real sex between two people in love happens.  Hold on tight, you are in for a wild ride with these two.
title: Passionate Interlude
